subject: Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Football
Concussions
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: Retired football players face a decision on whether to accept the proposed deal, to opt out and perhaps sue the league for more or to object and possibly appeal the settlement.
snippet: Retired football players face a decision on whether to accept the proposed deal, to opt out and perhaps sue the league for more or to object and possibly appeal the settlement.
